chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro Max has a problem:
I haven't received the product, I need to talk to the seller.
Thank you,

Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro Max has a problem:
I want to cancel the order
Thanks,

Hello,

The package of the order 40618052 returned back to our warehouse.

What should we do with this parcel?

Thank you.

Dear ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market.

A cordial greeting to you. I hope that you're having a good day. 

The customer is in the USA, so please refund the order therefore she cannot receive the package. 

Thank you for understanding and have a nice day!

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We will proceed with the refund soon.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market. 

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<. Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the “Report a Problem” button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g., iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Valentina, Back Market customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
